definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
Today is the key to the past.
pinyin: xian4 zai4 shi4 guo4 qu5 yao4 shi5

definition: even now/until now/right up to the present

sentences.english: A three-year-old girl is now a new living goddess in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 一名三岁女孩，现在是一个新的活女神在尼泊尔。

sentences.english: Once (he was)a worker , Pang Long now becomes a famous singer.
sentences.chinese: 庞龙曾经是个工人，现在变成一位著名的歌手。

sentences.english: It is now in flyable storage in Fort Worth.
sentences.chinese: 它现在在封存在沃斯堡。

sentences.english: I was a Teacher for America Corp member and I now work for TFA.
sentences.chinese: 我是为美国而教的成员，现在为组织工作。

sentences.english: Do you know what his whereabouts are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道他现在的所在之处是什么？

sentences.english: Yeah, but scented tea is now in fashion.
sentences.chinese: 是的，但现在的时尚是喝花茶。

sentences.english: Everything you have ever known Kratos, will now suffer because of your sacrilege .
sentences.chinese: 你要知道你现在所遭受的一切是来自于你的亵渎。

sentences.english: Now here’s Charlie, he’s come to the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 那么现在查理，他也来到了十字路口。

sentences.english: Now you can be the question asker.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以做提问题的人。

sentences.english: Feel how you are coming into s state of Balance with the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 感受你现在进入到一种与地球完全合一的全然状态。

sentences.english: E-Gold used for now BUT their own payment processor soon!
sentences.chinese: 虽然现在用eg，但是马上就推出自己的网银。

sentences.english: Mr Green has been out of work for several months and is on his uppers.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生失业好几个月了，现在已过得山穷水尽。

sentences.english: The one hundred and first meridian was passed.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经越过了经线一百零一度了。

sentences.english: The onus now is on the government of Pakistan to act with sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦政府现在有责任采取有诚意的行动。

sentences.english: You are only being examined on this semester's work.
sentences.chinese: 现在只考你在本学期学的课程。

definition: also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
